body.p: Residence: Whitley County, Kentucky. A Kentucky-born farmer. Son of Isham Lawson and Nancy Jane Croley. Married Susanna Adkins. Father of Martha (Lawson) Siler, Susan Lawson, Nancy (Lawson) Bryant, Melinda Lawson, David Y. Lawson, and Biddie (Lawson) Siler. Private in Company G, 14th Kentucky Volunteer Infantry. Mustered in 15 March 1864, Louisa, KY. Transferred to 14th Kentucky Veteran Infantry.
